data.title: Swiss pop star Bastian Baker named UNICEF ambassador
data.meta_description: Decorated Swiss singer-songwriter Bastian Baker is a newly appointed UNICEF ambassador.
data.text:
This news story has been written and carefully fact-checked by an external editorial team. At SWI swissinfo.ch we select the most relevant news for an international audience and use automatic translation tools such as DeepL to translate it into English. Providing you with automatically translated news gives us the time to write more in-depth articles.

If you want to know more about how we work, have a look here, and if you have feedback on this news story please write to english@swissinfo.ch.

Swiss national under investigation for fraudulent bankruptcy in Italy

This content was published on Italian authorities are investigating a Swiss national and three other individuals for fraudulent bankruptcy.

This content was published on Former Credit Suisse CEO Tidjane Thiam has announced on Instagram that he will appeal against the acquittal of his former housekeeper, stating that he believes the judgement was incorrect.
